entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:32 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 2:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 12:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 12:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
